nodes.text: A Separatist outpost was one of many droid outposts established on Felucia. When General Grievous learned of the Republic going on the offensive in Separatist-controlled territory, he sent battle droid reinforcements to this outpost in an attempt to secure his grip on the Felucia system. Soon after reinforcements arrived, the outpost became engulfed in a battle which resulted in the destruction of all deployed battle droids and the base being captured by the Republic.
After the Separatist Droid Army overwhelmed the Republic forces at the First Battle of Felucia, the Separatists installed several outposts on Felucia, including this base run by TZ-33.

The Republic eventually re-established a presence on Felucia thanks to the efforts of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan, Commander Ahsoka Tano, who led their clone troopers from the Grand Army of the Republic on an offensive into Confederate territory. In retaliation, General Grievous supplied this outpost with droid reinforcements to secure his hold on the system for the Confederacy. With added assistant from General Plo Koon and dividing their forces for different assaults on the outpost, the Jedi and the Republic troops were able to eliminate all droid forces and secure the base.
